'''''Poems and Stories''''' is a book first published in 1980. It reprints several works by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]: ''[[The Adventures of Tom Bombadil]]'', "[[The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth Beorhthelm's Son]]", ''[[On Fairy-Stories]]'', ''[[Leaf by Niggle]]'', ''[[Farmer Giles of Ham]]'', and ''[[Smith of Wootton Major]]''. The book was illustrated by [[Pauline Baynes]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=63790|articlename=Poems and Stories. 1980|dated=|website=TB|accessed=2 March 2015}}</ref>

A new hardback edition of ''Poems and Stories'' was published by [[HarperCollins]] in 1992 (ISBN 0261102907),<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=63800|articlename=Poems and Stories. 1992|dated=|website=TB|accessed=2 March 2015}}</ref> and by [[Houghton Mifflin]] in 1994 (ISBN 0395689996),<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.amazon.com/Poems-Stories-J-R-R-Tolkien/dp/0395689996|articlename=Poems and Stories by J.R.R. Tolkien|dated=|website=Amazon.com|accessed=21 January 2017}}</ref> with cover art by [[Alan Lee]].
